alert.note: Alert for Orleans; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 2:41PM CDT until June 10 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Louisiana, including the following parishes, Orleans and St. Bernard. * WHEN...Until 445 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 241 PM CDT, emergency management reported heavy rain with widespread flooding earlier that is slowly receding but still leading to street closures. Between 3 and 5.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... New Orleans, Arabi and Lakefront Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
